title: Trump Takes Back Obama-Era Transgender Guidelines (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Takes Back Obama-Era Transgender Guidelines (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- James Esseks, director of the ACLU LGBT & HIV project, and Neal McCluskey, director of the Institute for Educational Freedom at the Cato Institute, discuss recent actions by the White House, which leaves the issue of transgender rights to the states. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
